name: 2D Sidescroller Prototype Game
description:
Hello, this is my first video game, which will continue to be developed as a prototype over the coming months.

Note on controls:

W A S D Move
left mouse button Attack or mine ores
tabulator key inventory.

I am happy about feedback :-)
